---
title: An RMarkdown Template
title-prefix: "{myrmidon2}"
subtitle: Something to start with
author: "[Francis Barton](https://twitter.com/ludictech)"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
og-type: article
lang: en-GB
highlightjs: base16/eighties # use anything from js/hl/styles
csl: harvard-university-of-gloucestershire
link-citations: true
params:
  code_folding: false
keywords:
  - one
  - two
kable-scroll: true
knit: (
  function(input, ...) {
  rmarkdown::render(  
    input,
    output_format = rmarkdown::output_format(
      knitr = NULL,
      pandoc = list(to = "html5"),
      base_format = rmarkdown::html_document(
        template = "html5_template.html",
        css = "style.scss",
        self_contained = FALSE,
        theme = NULL,
        mathjax = NULL,
        highlight = NULL,
        anchor_sections = TRUE,
        section_divs = FALSE,
        smart = FALSE,
        md_extensions = "+emoji+header_attributes+auto_identifiers",
        includes = list(in_header = "includes/header.html",
                        before_body = "includes/before_body.html",
                        after_body = "includes/after_body.html"))))} )
---

```{r setup}
#| include: false
#| message: false

knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  comment = "#",
	echo = TRUE,
	fig.align = "center",
	fig.alt = "Alt text not provided",
	fig.height = 6,
	fig.width = 8,
	message = FALSE,
	dev = "ragg_png",
	dpi = 192,
	out.width = "80%",
	collapse = TRUE
)

knitr::knit_hooks$set(
  plot = function(x, options) {
  paste0('<figure><img src="',
        knitr::opts_knit$get('base.url'),
        paste(x, collapse = '.'),
        '" alt="',
        options$fig.alt,
        '"><figcaption>',
        options$fig.cap,
        '</figcaption></figure>')
})

if (params$code_folding) {
  knitr::knit_hooks$set(
  source = function(x, options) {
  paste0('<details>',
         '<summary>code</summary>',
         paste(x, collapse = ''),
         '</details>')
  }
  )
}


library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(xfun)

```
